summary: A celebrity impulsively leaves face-paced Tokyo to deliver a much-needed jeep to a remote village. When his controlling manager, the woman he loves, follows, the two must reconcile while dodging reporters.
cast: Yûjirô Ishihara|Ruriko Asaoka|Hiroyuki Nagato|Izumi Ashikawa|Tamio Kawaji|Asao Koike|Kôjirô Kusanagi|Asao Sano|Kaku Takashina|Zenji Yamada|Keisuke Yukioka|Ikunosuke Koizumi|Hiroshi Ichimura|Bin Moritsuka|Toyo Fukuda|Norikatsu Hanamura|Yasuhiro Kameyama|Tomio Aoki|Kôichirô Sakai|Tôru Sumikawa|Masahiro Kinoshita|Gô Kuroda|Jôji Hidehara|Shinzô Shibata|Hyôe Enoki|Toshizô Kuon|Makiko Aoi|Masuyo Suzumura|Chigusa Takayama|Michiko Amamiya|Makiko Obata|Etsuko Takeuchi|Yôko Ogata|Kumiko Mizumori|Kumiko Saitô|Yoshihiro Yamaguchi|Shingo Ishioka|Seijirô Hisamatsu|Masahiro Yatô|Toshirô Mayuzumi|Tsûsai Sugawara
title: Nikui an-chikushô
